channel.title: Updated Runescape Highscores? Thoughts / Suggestions?
channel.description:
With private servers, more and more are wanting to be like real Runescape, the highscores however are very outdated and mostly don't work for new and advanced servers. I was thinking of creating a highscores that is almost identical to the current one that runescape has located at, http://services.runescape.com/m=hiscore/heroes.ws ..
Obviously i would have to alter some things and change things here and there to make it work, let me know what your thoughts are on this project and if you think i should continue to do it. In the past i have released new themes for previous highscores to the moparscape community, this project may take a couple days but the end result would be really nice, almost identical to runescape's highscores, and easy to use, along with it being fully customizable.
Let me know your thoughts on this project, if i get enough positive feedback and people seem to want this, i'll work on it and try to have it released by this Saturday.
Thanks! Comment below with thoughts! -EclipseRuins

item.title: Updated Runescape Highscores? Thoughts / Suggestions?
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

please make this, will probably be SQLi vulnerable as are some of the older hi-scores

Read full topic

item.title: Updated Runescape Highscores? Thoughts / Suggestions?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

You should do it if you want to do it, not by feedback? Don’t listen to 90% of feedback because most of the time its from people who want whats best for them…

But those highscores would be nice obv…

Read full topic
